author: flo (tonebytone)
content: Amazing, yes. I happened to start at the bottom of this image for some strange reason. I thought that there was space between the left stone and the stone next to it on the right. Only to have my eyes travel to the top and discover that's the shiny face of the 2nd stone. Try as I might, I simply can NOT bring what looks like a background to me forward so it becomes part of the face of the stone! AAACCCKKK!!!
